Description:
UNDER CONTRACT
Enjoy your own very private balcony with a full northerly aspect.
As you enter this recently renovated unit you are greeted with water views from every aspect.
The open living plan offers a large lounge room with direct access to the balcony, walk through kitchen with stone benches; large master bedroom with a full northerly aspect, the second bedroom has plenty of room for a queen bed. The bathroom has also been recently renovated. This is all about location â€“ location with the beach just a few doors away and within walking distance to all that Cowes Central as to offer.
Insights: 4/7 BASS AVE, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2017 and 8 other 2 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
Tropical Living-Balinese Inspired Home
Boasting generous proportions and a superb flow, this fresh, stylish home provides an exceptional haven for effortless family living. Designed to embrace family and lifestyle, this unique home is 'one of a kind'. Located in central Cowes at the end of a Cul De Sac, 5 mins to town centre, school and beaches.
Open plan design with 9ft square set ceilings, bulk heads and hardwood timber features throughout.
Over 40sq home on a private fully fenced 808sqm allotment, fully landscaped with stone, timber and established tropical garden, extensive merbau decking and lounging areas with under roof outdoor kitchen.
A generous size master bedroom includes open en-suite with his and hers walk in robes,
bedrooms 2 and 3 with large walk in robes and ceiling fans.
Entertainers kitchen with large 'Caesar stone' waterfall island bench, walk in pantry, s/s Miele dishwasher, s/s gas cook top and electric oven.
The main living area is spacious with custom built TV feature wall, double timber doors open into a study nook,
adjoining is the 2nd living zone via 6 stack bifold door to allow the 2 living zones to interact. Perfect for those large family gatherings.
Features include stacked stone with in-built S/S gas log fire.
The double garage, easily accessed by the kitchen door and via a breezeway has a built in Home/Office.
This home was custom designed and built for entertaining family and friends, first time offered this unique property boasts to many inclusions to list.
Inspection by appointment only
Insights: 13 HAKEA COURT, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2017 and 56 other 4 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
STYLISH LIVING OR LUXURIOUS HOLIDAY RETREAT
Ever pictured yourself reclining beside the pool before retiring to the comfort of your luxurious home? Yes? Then this outstanding property is waiting for you.Spread over two levels, this home offers contemporary living at its best.
Ground level is beautifully laid out with a spacious open plan living area which opens onto an alfresco court yard and lawn area. The modern kitchen is stylish with stainless steel appliances and generous bench and cupboard space. The master bedroom is complemented by a large en-suite. An additional powder room makes the ground level an ideal entertainment area. Year round comfort is provided with reverse cycle heating and cooling and a gas log fire.
The upper level features a further 2 large bedrooms, a second living/entertainment space and main bathroom complete with bath and twin sinks. An ideal escape for the young ones or those looking for quiet space.
This fantastic townhouse is located in a secure gated complex, one of only three properties on the block and includes a double lock up garage. It comes complete with access to a shared in-ground swimming pool and communal undercover bbq area.
Currently leased as a holiday rental and located within walking distance of central Cowes and the magnificent Cowes beach, this property just keeps on giving. It is offered fully furnished, so your investment starts providing from the moment of settlement, or enjoy as your own luxurious private retreat.
Insights: 3/24 Redwood Drive, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2017 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
GREAT LOCATION, UNBEATABLE PRICE
Located in Grandview Ave, that boast of being walking distance to local shops, school, and of course the BEACH! This is one of 4 units all with great neighbours, offering its own secure garage and outside parking. Inside is a very generous open plan living with a full northerly aspect that flows right through the dining and kitchen, the living area leads out to a north facing patio for private outside settings, The polished timber floor has a glass like appearance. The master bedroom is massive and has its own access to a full en-suite, the second bedroom is large with plenty of room with built in robes, this is clean and tidy from top to bottom, an inspection will impress. Its priced right and will move quickly!!!

Description:
The look is modern!
Located in the family friendly Seagrove Estate is this modern split level residence.
The upper level comprises of a large spacious open plan living, kitchen and dining area with direct access to the rear undercover entertainment area. The bottom level is complete with three large bedrooms all with built in robes and nobo heaters and two bathrooms, the master is complete with Walk in Robe and Ensuite.
Other great features include split system heating and cooling, carpet and tiles throughout, study nook upstairs, stainless steel appliances to the kitchen and double carport.
Set on a 704 sqm approx fully fenced allotment with established low maintenance surrounds and with great tenants in place this property would be ideal for permanent living or investment purposes.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
WHEN LOCATION COUNTS!
Here is a brilliant free-standing townhouse in a complex of six. Immaculately presented, and only one house from the beach plus just a short walk to Cowes shopping precinct. Being brick the property is low maintenance and situated at the front has it's own access.
The townhouse is a two bedroom, however it also offers extra bedroom accommodation with a conversion to the garage area.
The property comes with a lovely kitchen with dishwasher, reverse cycle air conditioning, spacious lounge/dining area, large bedrooms, bathroom with bath, separate laundry and private courtyard.
Suitable for permanent, retirement or holiday living be quick to secure this excellent investment. It is well priced and in an enviable location with Cowes beach right on your doorstep.

Description:
IMMACULATE BEACH HOUSE
Located approximately 100m to the pristine northern Cowes Beach, enjoy the sea change and spend summer days by the ocean, walking the long stretch of white sand, safe for young children and canoeing.
Consisting of three bedrooms/ two bathrooms (the master with full en-suite).
The north facing deck is perfect for entertaining protected by the cover of leafy green trees. Open plan dining/kitchen/living areas are made comfortable with ceiling fans which complement the reverse cycle air conditioning.
Driveway to the park at front door adds to the convenience plus fully fenced yard which consists of fruit trees, garden shed and a lawn area provided for pets and children to play safely.
A reduced sized block will attract those who no longer wish to be a slave to maintenance.

Description:
Designed For Today's Needs
This modern single level residence set in the Shoalhaven Estate is sure to impress all buyers.
Comprising spacious north facing open plan living, kitchen and dining area, four robed bedrooms and two bathrooms, the master is complete with walk in robe and ensuite.
Additional features include high ceilings, a combination of carpet and tiled floors throughout, split system heating and cooling, stone bench tops, stainless steel induction cooktop, electric oven and dishwasher, there is also double garage with internal access.
Another impressive attribute is a lovely undercover alfresco entertainment area at the rear of the home that is accessible from the living area and master bedroom, perfect for those who love to entertain their guests.
This property is currently tenanted and is set within a 568 sqm approx fully fenced allotment with low maintenance surrounds and within walking distance of Cowes Beach.

Description:
Exceptional Coastal Living!
This beautifully appointed and incredibly stylish double storey home is set in the most select location only a 150m from Cowes beach.
Downstairs the spacious and welcoming entry leads to a comfortable separate living area, three generous bedrooms, luxuriously appointed family bathroom and practical laundry.
Upstairs comprises a light filled open plan living, kitchen and dining area, master suite complete with walk in robe and ensuite, in addition to a powder room. The kitchen is complimented by Caesar stone bench tops,glass splash-backs, soft closing draws, 900mm stainless steel gas cooktop, electric under bench oven and large walk in pantry.
Additional features include high square set ceilings throughout, polished timber floors, two split system heating and cooling units, open fire place, full length North facing entertainment deck offering a stunning treed outlook, quality fixtures and fittings throughout and double garage.
Set within a 604sqm approx allotment with lovely low maintenance established surrounds this would be the perfect weekender or permanent residence.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
It's Just Perfect!
Perfectly located in the fabulous Shearwater Estate is the beautifully presented double storey home in close proximity to the Cowes Golf Course, bay beach and everything that Cowes has to offer.
As you walk through the front door you are immediately greated with gorgeous spotted gum flooring, the entry level has a spacious open plan living, dining, kitchen featuring high quality appliances and finishes and abundant cupboard/storage space, fourth bedroom, laundry, powder room and internal access to garage. Main living opens out to an expansive undercover timber deck overlooking lovely landscaped gardens - sit back, relax and enjoy with family and friends!
Timber stairs lead up to a second living with balcony taking in views across the lake, a further three bedrooms, including a master with a huge ensuite leading through to a fabulous walk in robe.
Some of the additional features include : Caesar stone bench tops, including additional cabinetry in living, ducted vacuum, laundry chute, induction cooktop, split system heating cooling
Set on a 434sqm approx landscaped allotment makes this home ideal for permanent or holiday living. Inspection will impress.
This property in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
The potential is enormous!
Set in the heart of Cowes, only a short stroll to Cowes Primary School, supermarkets, RSL, doctors and the shopping precinct is this single level brick and hardiplank residence. Offering open plan living, kitchen and dining area, three bedrooms and one dual access bathroom.
Additional features include split system heating and cooling, carpet and tiles throughout, single carport, double garage and a lovely paved entertainment area.
Positioned on a fantastic 823 sqm fully fenced allotment with low maintenance established surrounds, and with a little bit of TLC this would be ideal for permanent or holiday living.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Offering the ideal introduction to the Cowes relaxed beachside lifestyle, this well positioned two bedroom home sits serenely on a 603sqm (approx.) allotment. Located in close proximity to the gorgeous Red Rocks Beach and only a short drive to the Cowes shops and restaurants, this home is ready and waiting for you to add your special touch.

Positioned only metres from the main street of Cowes, and within walking distance to north facing foreshore beaches, parks, major supermarkets, cafes and restaurants - this is a prime central location with huge development potential (S.T.C.A.).
Take advantage of this exceptional opportunity and enjoy the unlimited potential of this rare allotment. Contact Mike Foenander today for further details.

Looking for an acre?
This is a rare opportunity to secure the most central a 1 acre (approx) allotment in the centre of Cowes!
Close proximity to schools, sporting facilities, shops, cafe's, restaurants and an easy 1.3km stroll straight down Dunsmore Road to the pristine Cowes bay beach.
Perfect site to build your next home, mostly cleared and level with plenty of room for shedding, boats and caravans.
This great block won't last long!
This Cowes property is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
NEWLY RENOVATED
This newly renovated home is located in the western part of Cowes, close to Red Rocks and Ventnor beaches.
Featuring three good sized bedrooms, all with newly laid carpets and built in robes and cedar lined ceilings. The main bathroom has a newly installed shower, toilet and vanity. There is a separate laundry and the added bonus of an additional toilet.
The open plan kitchen living area is complemented by stone bench tops, and all new appliances. With plenty of cupboard space and room to move, this really is an entertainer's delight.
The polished spotted gum flooring in the living and hallway flows seamlessly through the double sliding doors and out onto the generous sized back deck, and wrap around decking to the front of the property.
On an approximate land size of 632m2 , the property also features a carport, is fully fenced and backs directly onto a reserve of approximately 5 acres â€“ room for all the family!!
This property is sure to impress. Inspections are a must.
Insights: 59 Teddy Bear Lane, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2017 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
MAGNIFICENT FORESHORE LOCATION
Huge foreshore property, 963m2 (approx.) which has been divided onto two separate titles and offers a wonderful investment for the future.
The home is recently completed and all the hard work has been done. It offers some wonderful features including 3 bathrooms, triple garage (one being higher than normal for the boat or caravan), two living rooms, beautiful kitchen, 5 bedrooms (or four and a study).
This is a magnificent location; only a short walk to all Cowes shopping precinct has to offer and the property backs onto the Cowes North facing beach.
Beach Street, Cowes is one of the most prestigious locations on Phillip Island.
Available for private inspection.
